metadata.description: Run Nmap with selectable scan profiles

findings.title: Nmap Output Error
findings.description: Could not parse XML. Raw output returned.
findings.evidence:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!DOCTYPE nmaprun>
<?xml-stylesheet href="file:///opt/homebrew/bin/../share/nmap/nmap.xsl" type="text/xsl"?>
<!-- Nmap 7.98 scan initiated Thu Nov 27 16:28:27 2025 as: nmap -T3 -Pn -sV -oX - -p 22,80,443 example.com -->
<nmaprun scanner="nmap" args="nmap -T3 -Pn -sV -oX - -p 22,80,443 example.com" start="1764241107" startstr="Thu Nov 27 16:28:27 2025" version="7.98" xmloutputversion="1.05">
<scaninfo type="connect" protocol="tcp" numservices="3" services="22,80,443"/>
<verbose level="0"/>
<debugging level="0"/>
<runstats><finished time="1764241112" timestr="Thu Nov 27 16:28:32 2025" summary="Nmap done at Thu Nov 27 16:28:32 2025; 0 IP addresses (0 hosts up) scanned in 5.11 seconds" elapsed="5.11" exit="success"/><hosts up="0" down="0" total="0"/>
</runstats>
</nmaprun>

raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!DOCTYPE nmaprun>
<?xml-stylesheet href="file:///opt/homebrew/bin/../share/nmap/nmap.xsl" type="text/xsl"?>
<!-- Nmap 7.98 scan initiated Thu Nov 27 16:28:27 2025 as: nmap -T3 -Pn -sV -oX - -p 22,80,443 example.com -->
<nmaprun scanner="nmap" args="nmap -T3 -Pn -sV -oX - -p 22,80,443 example.com" start="1764241107" startstr="Thu Nov 27 16:28:27 2025" version="7.98" xmloutputversion="1.05">
<scaninfo type="connect" protocol="tcp" numservices="3" services="22,80,443"/>
<verbose level="0"/>
<debugging level="0"/>
<runstats><finished time="1764241112" timestr="Thu Nov 27 16:28:32 2025" summary="Nmap done at Thu Nov 27 16:28:32 2025; 0 IP addresses (0 hosts up) scanned in 5.11 seconds" elapsed="5.11" exit="success"/><hosts up="0" down="0" total="0"/>
</runstats>
</nmaprun>
